short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To keep your private diary and notebook in the cloud, features clean, simple and elegant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Clean interface, no hassle, tricks or Ads.
- Stay private, secure and elegant.
- Optional label to organize your diaries.
- Publish your diaries on the web by one click.
- Builtin themes and fonts to customize your diary.
- Create your own themes.
- Popup rich editor, format your text just a breeze.
- Normal/timeline/focus modes to view your diaries.
- Mail your diary to other people.
- Create diary by sending email.
- Sort/focus mode/spell/grammar check and more.
- Add pictures/video to your diaries.
- In active development.

*** NOTE ***
0. If you are a teacher, and want a diary app to be used across class, please check out our another app: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/notebook-for-class/olgmbcokffmfcoejflbldleogoafmemo

1. If you would like to login using other account(Facebook/Twitter/Yahoo), please go to our homepage: https://www.enginestart.org/mydiary.html

2. This app do have password protection, see Settings->Password lock.

3. You can access this app from tablet or iPad, through the web interface, just open below link in your mobile browser: https://diary.enginestart.org

4. Note that this is the free version of My Diary, which may have limitations on some features, if you are heavy user and want unlimited use, please go pro(which is one time and permanent).

5. Data privacy policy: https://www.enginestart.org/other/privacy.html

Any questions, please feel free to contact mydiary@enginestart.org
